description:
An all-around day hiking snowshoe, the Wilderness is the right blend of functional technology and comfort. Optimized for trails yet features a deck with good floatation for when you get into the deep stuff. An articulation system gives good flex and lets you cover varied terrain and snow conditions.

  • SoftTec™ decking is lightweight and offers great flotation in deep snow
  • Fit-Step™ 2.0 Frame allows for an efficient, natural stride
  • 180™ EZ Pro Binding is padded to eliminate pressure points
  • Cobra™ Toe crampons provide great grip on firm snow
  • ActiveLift™ Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
  • Articulation system maintains a natural foot position and allows for lateral flex
name: Tubbs Wilderness Snowshoes - Unisex
